summary: Allows you to see which mods are installed without exiting your game!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1330707422_Moorelf_1328629167_logo_sagittarius3.png[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1418342-relz-in-game-load-order-viewer]Official Bethesda thread[/url][/center]


[center][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]============================ ENGLISH ============================[/b][/color][/center]

[b]Version:[/b] 1.0
[b]Author:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=972816]Sagittarius22[/url]
[b]Category:[/b] Utilities
[b]Requirement:[/b] [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1411369-relz-skyui/page__view__findpost__p__21678917]SKYUI 3.0 ALPHA or higher[/url] and [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/beta/skse_1_06_02.7z] SKSE 1.6.2 or higher[/url].
[b]Description:[/b] This mod uses the Mod Configuration Menu included in SkyUI 3.0 to bring you an in-game load order viewer. It basically allows you to see which mods are installed
in Skyrim without having to exit the game. It provides informations about the author and a description of the mod, if available.
Clicking on an official DLC will allow you to see the official trailer.
[b]Install[/b]: this is installed as any other mods: merge the DATA folder contained in the archive with the DATA folder you can find in your game\'s directory.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25817-4-1350828453.jpg[/img]
author: Sagittarius22

files.name: In-Game Load Order Viewer 1dot1 update
files.changelogHtml: Removes the TRUE text on the left of the mod.
